com.github.astefanich.dao

Class FileAccountDao

  • Object
    • FileAccountDao
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AccountDao, AutoCloseable

    public class FileAccountDao
extends Object
implements AccountDao
    Implementation methods needed to store and load accounts from persistent file storage.
    Author:
    AndrewStefanich

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Close the DAO.

      Removes the Account directory and any subcontents from persistent memory.

      Lookup an account in based on account name.
      void reset()
      Remove all account directories from the FileAccountDao root target folder (used for testing purposes)

      Adds or updates an Account into persistent memory.

        public void close()
           throws AccountException

        Specified by:
